Package com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.provider.discovery

Topology Discoverer Service Documentation

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CurrentTopologyDiscoverer Discoverer for a topology.
DiscoveryFilterFactory Static helper methods for creating discovery filters.
TopologyDiscovererService Service that manages queries to all of the TopologyDiscoverers and ensures that results are unique.
TopologyTopologyDiscoverer Base code for a Discoverer for a topology.
TopologyUnitDescriptor UnitDescriptor for a unit discovered in a topology.
 

Package com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.provider.discovery Description

Topology Discoverer Service Documentation

Topology Discoverer Service

Abstract [Index]

Units can be "discovered" outside the current topology using a TopologyDiscoverer. A topology discoverer service provides a way to query any number of discoverers for units that meet the conditions defined in a discovery filter. Discovered units can then be added to the topology.

A discovery filter factory provides static methods to create filters for particular purposes and to determine if a filter is for a particular purpose.

This documentation is maintained by Michael H Kalantar (kalantar{at}us.ibm.com).
